name: Jellyfin-Roulette
description: A Jellyfin plugin that intercepts playlist clicks and displays a modal with two options: play a random unwatched item with a slot machine animation, or view the normal playlist. Features dynamic resize, audio ticks, confetti celebration, and glassmorphism UI.
overview: Transform playlist browsing into an exciting slot machine experience with smooth animations and audio feedback

versions.changelog: Focus trap fix: keyboard navigation stays within modal, prevents background interaction
Bug fixes: keyboard Enter key support, Show List navigation, and focus indicators
Initial public release with slot machine animation, dynamic container resize, audio feedback, and confetti effects
